attributes.comment:
To Whom it may concern,
I am writing this letter as just one person amongst a huge community network of
adoptive parents.We have waited to have a child for so very long and still have a
very long wait ahead of us. We (my husband & I ) already went through the
process with Immigration & Naturalization & paid all the fees required. With tha
long wait ahead of us we realize we will have to go through it again & pay all the
fees once again. I plead with you NOT to increase fees.I cant stress to you
enough the effect this would have on so many people and MOST IMPORTANTLY
the children we yearn to bring home. Please hear our very important request.
Thank you,
Sincerely,
Patricia and Terry Mill
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Patricia Mills
